S:BR_FIRE | BR_DISI | SCARE | BLIND | CONF | S_KIN | S_CYBER |
S:S_DEMON | S_HI_UNDEAD
D:Gothmog is the Chief Balrog in Morgoth's personal guard.  He
D: is renowned for slaying Ecthelion the Warder of the Gates and
D: he has never been defeated in combat.  With his whip of flame
D: and awesome fiery breath he saved his master from Ungoliant's
D: rage.

N:583:The Serpent of Chaos
G:J:D
I:155:200d150:111:175:0
W:100:1:0:66666
B:CRUSH:SHATTER:22d10
B:CRUSH:SHATTER:22d10
B:BITE:LOSE_ALL:10d12
B:TOUCH:UN_POWER:0d0
F:UNIQUE | QUESTOR | ATTR_MULTI | FORCE_DEPTH | FORCE_MAXHP |
F:FORCE_SLEEP | ONLY_ITEM | DROP_1D2 | DROP_2D2 | DROP_3D2 | DROP_4D2 |
F:DROP_GOOD | DROP_GREAT | DROP_CHOSEN | SMART | CAN_SPEAK | REFLECTING |
F:REGENERATE | ATTR_ANY | POWERFUL | AURA_FIRE | AURA_ELEC | KILL_WALL |
F:KILL_BODY | EVIL | NONLIVING | IM_ACID | IM_ELEC | IM_FIRE |
F:IM_COLD | IM_POIS | RES_TELE | RES_NETH | NO_FEAR | NO_STUN |
F:NO_CONF | NO_SLEEP
S:1_IN_3 |
S:ROCKET | BR_POIS | BR_NETH | BR_CHAO | BR_MANA | BR_NUKE | BA_CHAO |
S:BR_DISI | BRAIN_SMASH | HASTE | HAND_DOOM | S_CYBER | S_MONSTERS |
S:S_HI_UNDEAD | S_HI_DRAGON | S_WRAITH | S_UNIQUE
D:The Big Boss himself. Before the universe the Serpent was. The
D: Unicorn of Order fought with Serpent and stole one of its eyes,
D: known as the Jewel of Judgement. With the Jewel, Dworkin drew
D: the Pattern and thus gave birth to the infinite worlds of shadow.
D: Now the balance has been disrupted, the Pattern damaged, and
D: all the shadow is being absorbed by the Serpent. Unless it is
D: stopped, the word as we know it will come to an end, all order
D: reverting to Primal Chaos.
